description:
Having fun with just a touch 

Global No.1 Chinese Mahjong game 【明星三缺1】iPhone version now released 
Play with more than 12Million+ real players instantly. 
Play whenever you want! 
Play with numerous famous stars! 

The most popular Mahjong game in the global Chinese area. You may play the role as the famous Stars, which has their funny dubbing. We invite「陳亞蘭」, who is the Best host of Golden Bell Awards to let you experience five people playing Mahjong together! We also have「小S」, 「謝金燕」,「林美秀」, 「張菲」, 「豬哥亮」,「全連先生」, 「蕭薔」 and other famous stars to always play with you, so…BORING…OUT! 

※NOW totally free for downloading 【明星3缺1】iPhone version, more than 12Million+ real players instantly play with you. 

Highlights 
1.Play whenever & wherever! 
2.Play with numerous famous stars! 
3.Excellent graphic with high resolution! 
4.Huge amount of free i coins for new register player 
5.Free i coins recharging everyday! 
6.Auto-match with 12Million+ players, no need to worry nobody to play with! 
7.Playing Mahjong with 5 people? Only on明星3缺1 
8.The member of Facebook can also login easily. 
9.New register just only need to insert your email without providing any other private info~ fast and easy! 

More interesting games please visit: 
Gametower Official website : www.gametower.com.tw/Games/Mobile/i371/index.aspx

Report a Problem：http://i.371.com.tw/131
